description: The windy elves that know the theory of air flows, tear the enemy apart!

name: Str Meal A
description: Ignoring the expensive ingredients, it is the softest and most delicious cuisine which are said to come from the Dragon City. STR ＋5, Melee Damage ＋10%, this effect lasts 30 minutes.

description: Ignoring the expensive ingredients, it is the softest and most delicious cuisine which are said to come from the Dragon City. STR ＋10, Melee Damage ＋20%, this effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: STR Necklace[1]
description: The masterpiece of master Leman, inlaid with his magic force, can strengthen user's vitality.

name: Strange Fireworks
description: It's been told, holding fireworks is cool? DO NOT do that at home kids!

description: The mask worn by the goblin is very weird.

description: A sour and sweet red strawberry that can restore 45-55 points of SP.

description: Strawberry season always makes me excited. I said with an obsessed expression.

description: I just want to drown in the strawberry pudding, so what? [Author: Tian Shi Bu Ku]
